content: There has been a feature request in #14437 for adding confetti animation when one writes "congratulations". Could we add a markdown implementation that triggers certain animations? This could open up many fun opportunities.

I think we want to avoid any special support for animations, since people grow tired of them pretty quickly. We do have animated emojis. And we do support animated gifs inside of messages. Have you played with our giphy bot at all?
Yeah, that feature seems like a pretty clear wontfix issue.
I'll try out the giphy bot for sure:grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
